name: 黃晟豪
objective:
此為全英文授課課程
This course will be given in English.

(1) Fundamentals of Acoustics
(2) Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis
(3) Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards
(4) Basic Noise Control Procedure
(5) Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control
(6) Engine Noise and Its Control
(7) Vehicle Noise Sources 
(8) Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement
(9) Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.
